title: macbook air  820-3437-b fan spin fast and no display
message: I have 820-3437-b with fan spinning fast and no picture on screen. any idea?

title: macbook air  820-3437-b fan spin fast and no display
macbook air  820-3437-b fan spin fast and no display
message: Bad SMC or corrosion under SMC. I bet a good ultrasonicing at 80c for a minute will fix this.

title: macbook air  820-3437-b fan spin fast and no display
message: i put another smc and still this same problem

title: macbook air  820-3437-b fan spin fast and no display
message: To me this sounds like some kind of a sensor issue. Almost sounds like PROCHOT  is being asserted. There are several resistors around the SMC that have thermal sensor signals going through them. You need to check them. PROCHOT is asserted by Q5159, U7200 and the SMC. Have a look at those components and see how they look.. You need to look at all the resistors around the SMC and measure them. It will be time consuming but the issue may very well lie in one of them. Since the CPU would have vcore if PROCHOT you would still get a light but it would not get hot as it would be throttling vcore heavily.  [ATTACH type="full" width="200px"]20814._xfImport[/ATTACH]

title: macbook air  820-3437-b fan spin fast and no display
message: Specifically, Check these guys [ATTACH type="full" width="60%"]20816._xfImport[/ATTACH]

USB is MUXed to SMC so could be that is initializing the mouse. 

ALL_SYS present? SMC_DELAYED present?
